column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The décor at Lou's is best described as Sports Bar meets Pizzeria.  The subtle and modest atmosphere
column2: that's greatly complemented by the ensemble of autograph jerseys that engulfs the walls of this establishment
column3: aides in its theme.  Various notables ranging from a Bobby Knight autographed Red Sweater to a signed Larry Bird Celtics Jersey are on full display.  Needless to say
column4: the sports fan will find this establishment hard to turn up.
